cannotStartWhilePlaying: You must finish the current game before starting a new one. Do you want to give up?
rwaKnownWrongAnswer: I already told you that this is not the correct answers! Try with another one.
wrongAnswer: Wrong answer! The right one was "{answer}"
negativeAnswerIndex: The answer index must be positive.
askForAnswerConfirm: Are you sure that your answer is "{answer}"?
gaveUp: You gave up. The right answer was "{answer}".
askForGiveUpConfirm: Are you sure you want to give up?
noLifelinesDescription: You currently don't have any lifeline, but remember that you can always give up to double your score.
lifelinesGiveUpDescription: Also remember that you can always give up to double your score.
askForSqConfirm: Are you sure you want to switch the question?

askForRwaConfirm.singular: Are you sure you want to remove a wrong answer?
askForRwaConfirm.plural: Are you sure you want to remove {answers} wrong answers?

lifelineCooldownWarning.singular: You won't be able to use this lifeline again for one turn.
lifelineCooldownWarning.plural: You won't be able to use this lifeline again for the next {turns} turns.

rwaCooldownWait.singular: You have to wait another turn to remove some wrong answers again.
rwaCooldownWait.plural: You have to wait for {turns} more turns to remove some wrong answers again.

sqCooldownWait.singular: You have to wait another turn to switch the question again.
sqCooldownWait.plural: You have to wait {turns} more turns to switch the question again.

newRecord: Congratulations! This is your new record.
noRecord: You still don't have a score record.
tellMeWhenToStart: Tell me when you want to start a new game.
